$comment: This file contains category-specific questions to ask users after initial analysis. These questions help gather additional context for more accurate analysis.

questions.question: What materials is the teether made of?
questions.helpText: Material type affects CPSIA testing requirements and costs.

questions.question: What age group is this product for?
questions.helpText: Age range determines specific safety testing requirements.

questions.question: Is the material food-grade certified?
questions.helpText: Food-grade materials are required for products that go in babies' mouths.

questions.question: Does the product use any colorants or dyes?
questions.helpText: Colorants must be non-toxic and FDA-approved.

questions.question: What grade of stainless steel will be used?
questions.helpText: Food-grade stainless steel (304 or 316) is required for food contact products.

questions.question: Does the product have any interior coating or lining?
questions.helpText: Any coating must be FDA-approved for food contact.

questions.question: Is this a vacuum-insulated (double-wall) product?
questions.helpText: Vacuum insulation requires additional testing for seal integrity.

questions.question: Will you claim the product is dishwasher safe?
questions.helpText: Dishwasher safety claims require specific testing documentation.
